name: TravelJoy, Inc.
description: Operator of a travel management platform intended to help tourism industries book ideal clients faster, with less legwork. The company's platform offers simple tools with a modern and digital trip planning experience, enabling businesses to book clients and run their travel business effectively with simple invoicing and secure payments.
